page.title: 14ALMS COTTAGE
page.content: ALMS COTTAGE IS OWNED BY ROBIN AND JANET WELLS.IT IS A 125 YEARS OLD.IN 1978 THEY STARTED TO MAKE ADDITIONS.IT HAD 6 ROOMS BUT IT WAS 2 COTTAGES.IT HAS ALWAYS BEEN A HOUSE FOR POOR PEOPLE.YES THEY HAVE MADE ALTERATIONS.THESE ARE WHAT THEY MADE 1 BATH-ROOM,1 KITCHEN,1 BED-ROOM,1 UTILITIY,1 CONSER AND 1 GARAGE.THEY USED TO HAVE 2 WELLS BUT NOW THEY ARE A KITCHEN WITH WATER NOW.THEY DO HAVE SOME OLD BEAM RAFTERS OVER THE WINDOWS.IT HAD GAS LIGHTS IT WAS NORTH SEA GAS NO HOT WATER 1 COLD TAP AND 1OUTSIDE TOILET.THE OWNER BEFORE ROBIN AND JANET WELLS KEPT ALL HIS TOYS AND COMICS FOR 50 YEARS THEY HAD NO ELECTRICTY UN-TIL 1978 THE GARAGE IS A TIN SHED FRIST USED FOR STORING BUSES THE OWNERS NAME WAS BENNIE SMEATON WHO USED TO DRIVE THE VILLAGE BUS.THE GARDEN DURING THE WAR WAS USED AS A-
